original_title: Water tariff to be increased by 30 percent
original_body_lines: Water tariff is to be increased from at least 30 to 40 percent from today, the National Water Supply and Drainage Board ( NWSDB) announced yesterday.
The gazette notification was expected to be issued at the time this report went to press.
NWSDB assured that low-income families will not be affected by the hike. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
